rComments: a bit boring but the topics are intersting. I wish we could cover more social movements but the ones we cover are very in depth and connect to others. essay midterm, essay final, and final project on a social movement. didn't show up a couple times. huge reader, over 600 pgs!

Knows a great deal on movements she was involved in as well as others. Not a good source of information for movements of color besides the civil rights movement. Jump at the change to take a course with her - they're rare and valuable. One of a kind.

Very interesting and in-depth lectures taught by a radical professor who was very involved herself in many of these movements.  An amazing and vital class for those interested in social movements.  History of Consciousness doesn't even have an undergrad department, so snatch this class up if you get the chance.
